remarks: The projection on a subspace join is the sum of the projections. (Contributed by NM, 1-Nov-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjidm.1 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjidm.2 $e |- A e. ~H $.
pjsslem.1 $e |- G e. CH $.
pjcji $p |- ( H C_ ( _|_ ` G ) -> ( ( projh ` ( H vH G ) ) ` A ) = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` G ) ` A ) ) ) $.
